channel.title: Comments on: Day 40 – One Day at a Time – Monday, May 15

item.title: By: Wendy Kilpatrick
item.dc:creator: Wendy Kilpatrick
item.description: Hello from Susan, Ann and Wendy Montanari Please let SueB know that we are cheering for her recovery and ease of living! Sending best love!
item.content:encoded:
Hello from Susan, Ann and Wendy Montanari
Please let SueB know that we are cheering for her recovery and ease of living! Sending best love!
